    • Field Detail

      • CHANNEL_OPEN_TIMEOUT_PROP

        public static final String CHANNEL_OPEN_TIMEOUT_PROP
        Configuration value on the FactoryManager to control the channel open timeout. If not specified then DEFAULT_CHANNEL_OPEN_TIMEOUT value is used
        See Also:
